EmailTemplate.description: Use to send requests for 2018 planning meeting
EmailTemplate.name: Account Planning 2018
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Account} and 10K 2018 Planning Discussion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
To help us ensure we can successfully support your projects in 2018, we'd like to have a quick planning meeting with you. The agenda for this meeting will be to discuss your plans for Salesforce and 10K for next year.
Can you please let us know the best time over the next few weeks to have this conversation by filling in a few dates/times here? We appreciate your time and are excited to work with you in 2018!
Thank you, Diane Shotton VP, Client Services 602-574-7351 Diane@10kview.com
